coedgelist_from_he_ds()
coedgelist_from_he_ds Produce an extended edgelist from the information in a half-edge data structure, but using the 'virtual' edges between faces instead of the actual edges between vertices.

edgelist_to_adjmat()
edgelist_to_adjmat Convert an edgelist to an adjacency matrix. The edgelist is treated as an index array for the desired matrix.
